snippet: In New York, transplanted Londoners and their American sympathizers come together at bars - often at appallingly early weekend morning hours - to watch their teams play in the company of fellow fans.
abstract: In New York, transplanted Londoners and their American sympathizers come together at bars - often at appallingly early weekend morning hours - to watch their teams play in the company of fellow fans.

headline.main: New York's Best Bars for Watching British Football
